clienttweaks.configuration.customization: Items that count as fireworks for the offhand-firework tweak options.
Blocks that should be protected in the prevent accidental mining tweak.
Items that count as shields for the offhand-shield hiding tweak options.
Items that count as weapons for the offhand-shield hiding tweak options.
Items that count as torches for the offhand-torch tweak options.
Items that are allowed to place torches from the offhand if offhandTorchWithToolOnly is enabled.
clienttweaks.configuration.title: Client Tweaks
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.autoCl: This option will let you climb ladders automatically by just looking upwards, rather than requiring a key to be held down.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.chainB: This option will make chains have a bigger hitbox while placing them, making it easier to aim.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.creati: This option will increase the hitbox of random-offset blocks in creative mode, making it easier to break them quickly.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.disabl: This option will disable log stripping.
Disable Paving with Block in Offhand
This option will disable paving when holding a block in your offhand.
This option will disable step assist added by other mods.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.doNotU: This prevents the last durability from being used up.
This prevents the last torch in the offhand from being placed.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.hideOf: This option will hide your offhand item. It can be toggled via an optional key binding.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.hideOw: This option will hide your own potion particle effects for your client (other players will still see them).
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.hideSh: This option will hide your shield unless you are holding a weapon.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.master: This adds back the master volume slider to the options screen. Saves you a click!
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.musicV: This adds back the music volume slider to the options screen. Saves you a click!
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.noOffh: No Offhand Fireworks With Elytra Unless Airborne
This prevents fireworks from being launched from your off hand if you are wearing an Elytra, unless you're flying.
This prevents torches from being placed from your offhand at all.
This prevents torches from being placed from your offhand if you have a block in your main hand.
No Offhand Torch With Empty Hand
This prevents torches from being placed from your off hand if you have an empty main hand.
This prevents torches from being placed from your offhand if you have food in your main hand.
This prevents items from being used from your offhand if you have food in your main hand.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.noReci: This option makes the recipe book not shift the inventory when opened. Works best with smaller GUI scales / bigger resolutions.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.offhan: This restricts torches to be placed from the offhand only when you're holding a tool in your main hand.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.paneBu: This option will make iron fences and glass panes have a bigger hitbox while placing them, making it easier to aim.
clienttweaks.configuration.tweaks.preven: Prevents accidental mining of certain fragile blocks like budding amethysts.
